components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to DU Network in UAE

incident_updates.body: We are observing successful SMS delivery [to DU Network in UAE.  We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to DU Network in UAE. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations. We will provide updates in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations. We will provide updates in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations. We will provide updates in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified the issues causing delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations. We will provide updates in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are continuing our investigation and have discovered Programmable Messaging - SMS is affected by delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations.

Our monitoring systems have identified potential delays in A2P 10DLC T-Mobile Registrations and De-Registrations. Our engineering team has been notified and is currently investigating the issue. We will provide updates in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 25 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 25 April 2024 at 13:15 PDT until 25 April 2024 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Turkey is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 25 April 2024 at 15:15 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Turkey handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Puerto Rico is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 April 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 25 April 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US and Puerto Rico handsets.

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 April 2024 at 13:15 PDT until 27 April 2024 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 April 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 29 April 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of France phone numbers.

Our SMS carrier partner in Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 29 April 2024 at 22:00 PDT until 30 April 2024 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Canada handsets via Canada short codes.

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 May 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 06 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Indosat Ooredoo

incident_updates.body: The Indosat Ooredoo network in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 May 2024 at 01:30 PDT until 08 May 2024 at 02:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Indosat Ooredoo Indonesia handsets.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 May 07:00 until 10 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Singapore.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 10 May 07:00 until 10 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in SG1.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 11 May 09:00 until 11 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in SG1.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 May 09:00 until 11 May 14:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Singapore (SG1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Singapore.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 24 May 06:00 until 24 May 13:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Japan (JP1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in JP1.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 25 May 08:00 until 25 May 13:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Japan (JP1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in JP1.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The KDDI network in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 23 April 2024 at 04:00 PDT until 25 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from KDDI Japan handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

23 April 2024 at 04:00 PDT until 23 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT
24 April 2024 at 04:00 PDT until 24 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT
25 April 2024 at 04:00 PDT until 25 April 2024 at 14:00 PDT
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
